author: ylavic
msg: core: Fix chunk header parsing defect.
Remove apr_brigade_flatten(), buffering and duplicated code from
the HTTP_IN filter, parse chunks in a single pass with zero copy.
Limit accepted chunk-size to 2^63-1 and be strict about chunk-ext

author: tilman
msg: PDFBOX-2530: move block up and shorten to keep similar blocks together

author: violetagg
msg: ADD_CHILD_EVENT must be sent even when there are failures during child's start, thus MapperListener will be added as Container/Lifecycle Listener and will be able to receive events related to the corresponding Container.
